__e: Look, if you want me to tell you that George and I don't still have feelings for each other, I can't.
The women here don't see it that way.
No, I-I can't feel bad for you right now.
And I said, "Cause I want the girl!" And he said, "What's underneath it?"
Maybe you feel a certain way about this girl right now, then when you get back home...
Somebody pinned the bleeding heart of China on your sleeve... but they never got around to me.
Though I do acknowledge that the sense that you intend is gaining increasing currency through its use, yes.
What I do know is he'll never feel about you the way that I do.
They can't feel the same things a man and a woman feel.
